description: A selection of the documentary photographer’s work is on view in London this week.
title: Joel Sternfeld’s Color Photographs
title_page: Joel Sternfeld’s Color Photographs - The New York Times
maintext:
Slide 1 of 11,
A selection of the documentary photographer’s work from the ’70s and ’80s — some of which has never been seen before — is on view in London this week.
Here, “Portage Glacier, Alaska, August 1984”
